info.title: EasyRPG player
info.author: Rinnegatamante, EasyRPG team
info.details:
EasyRPG Player is a software allowing you to run games built with RPG Maker 2000 and RPG Maker 2003 on your system.
It supports several consoles and now Switch support got added.

Place your games in /switch/easyrpg-player (same folder for RTP files if required, so /switch/easyrpg-player/rtp).
